website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive squeegee that stands out for its long blade and comfortable handle, but you're limited if you wish to extend it with a telescoping pole.
pros: Professional squeegee at an affordable price
Ergonomic, lightweight rubber grip, with a stainless steel frame
Can be used with any Unger telescoping pole
cons: This squeegee doesn't include threads and won't work with standard threaded poles

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I use to pay a young man to wash my windows, but he would just stare my wife's breasts and make inappropriate remarks to my daughter. I fired him and bought this Squeegee. Now My windows look better than ever! Truly a life changing decision!
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: very, very nice wide squeegee
customer_reviews.text: Needed to find a wide squeegee for wiping down our shower doors and this was it! Almost all other squeegees are too small to wipe the doors in 2 passes (they require 3 passes), so with this wide squeegee I am able to wipe door in only 2 overlapping passes. I know; sounds trivial, but I have to shower often and using this wider squeegee is a simple way to make wiping down the shower doors just a little easier. Nice grip on the handle, and the second rubber blade is a nice bonus. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Air Cooled

customer_reviews.title: shower glass washing sexiness
customer_reviews.text: So I like to do sexy dances for my husband while I'm showering but also like to contribute to household chores at the same time. I ordered this product & kill two birds with one stone. He's happy, I'm happy & there are no longer hard-to-clean water spots marring our beautiful shower glass doors. Everybody wins.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle in the Desert

customer_reviews.title: Ok for low price
customer_reviews.text: The original rubber left streaks on the glass. The replacement that came with the original order fixed the problem, so I am ok. There was no way to contact the seller directly and for $11 I wasn’t going to trouble Amazon for a total replacement. Next time I will purchase from the local hardware store. Had the seller followed up on my satisfaction, the issue would likely have been resolved and received a 5 star rating. I remain a loyal Amazon customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality tool, makes cleaning large windows easy
customer_reviews.text: Great tool if paired with the right process. I have 10ft windows that can be pretty difficult to clean. I first spray, then scrub the windows with a separate tool. Once wet and scrubbed this squeege makes quick work of the liquid. If you dont prescrub and have a wet enough window you will get streaks. A rag on hand is a must to both wipe the blade and the window edges. The overlapping technique to produce a streak free finish can take some practice but you'll get to look like a ninja while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Merle Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: This is being used for the glass shower door and tile. I've had other squeegees over the years but this one is holding up the best. It's wide so fewer sweeps are needed plus I now squeegee my ceramic tile in the shower. It's also stainless steel so I have a stainless steel sticky hook to hang this on in the shower. It comes with extra rubber and it is replaceable, so I know I don't have to keep spending money on new squeegees. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: TZ

customer_reviews.title: Good but a bit of a let down without threaded handle
customer_reviews.text: Well, I should have read the reviews. Don’t get me wrong this is a good squeegee but....indeed it is not threaded and yes you have to buy the Unger pole. The Unger pole has it’s lock system for this as well as threads that I assume will work with other things like rollers. But at $45 for a 12’ pole I’m not happy. The squeegee is $10, the pole $45, so yeah if you want to spend that much to get the windows clean it’s a great squeegee. I’ll just tape it to my old pole for now
customer_reviews.author: Frank Canonica

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfect! I read some reviews that said it didn't fit on a standard broom stick handle so I was a bit concerned I would have to buy their extension. I have several extension poles so I tried it on and it fit on a couple of them just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome F. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Great performance!! So much better than others I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: I decided not to spend money hiring window washers this year and instead, tackled them myself. This squeegee made a huge difference in the quality of the cleaning and made the task so much quicker! I also bought a smaller, 8" squeegee from my local hardware store for my divided light window panes. The non-Unger one does not perform nearly as well. The Unger is far superior and suctions much better with no streaking. The rubber on the Unger is softer and more pliable, which is why i think it works so well. I have to follow up with a lint-free cloth when I use the smaller (non-Unger) one.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Shower Cleanup a breeze
customer_reviews.text: The 16" width make the cleanup of my glass shower wall a breeze. 6 strokes instead of 12 or 14 makes a dreary job easier. Good edge and very impressed with spare included. The rubberized handle is easy to hold and looks like it would fit easily on a pole for larger jobs.
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year now and use it daily in my shower. I haven't had to replace the squeegee rubber and it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: crafty lady

customer_reviews.title: Works great for large showers
customer_reviews.text: We have a very large frameless glass shower. I bought a smaller squeegee and my husband wouldn’t have it. He bought this one and it is so much better. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: exactly what you need from a squeegee
customer_reviews.text: perfect squeegee for regular window cleaning. coming with an extra rubber is a plus. if you’re still using windex, stop. get a wand and a squeegee. seriously so easy to use and works 10,000x better than smearing windex over a window.
customer_reviews.author: Kait Reay

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine. Fit on a standard tapered pole which I already had for use with a scrub brush. As it is a press fit it may twist slightly on the pole. It was not a problem for me. Removed water with no streaks. A hole in the handle could be used to screw it to the handle if wanted to prevent twisting on the pole. Does the job and appears sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ken T

customer_reviews.title: Right size
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and correct size. My husband loves it. It saves lots of time for us to clean out bathroom. And it cleans well and you barely can see any water after that.
customer_reviews.author: Yangxiaoyang

customer_reviews.title: Great window squeegee
customer_reviews.text: This makes cleaning windows a breeze and leaves them so clean. One complaint /suggestion I do have is that I wish it could be used with universal poles to screw on that I use for mops, paint rollers etc...I dont want to invest in a pole just for this so i made it work, but other than that this is a great product to use on windows!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bailey

customer_reviews.title: This Squeegee is Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for cleaning the sliding doors. The large size and high quality rubber squeegee work so well that the windows have seemed to disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Pmcfarl499

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: I use it to wipe the freezer glass doors at the grocery store so that I can see what I am buying as a customer on those humid days.
customer_reviews.author: hawaiiannovice

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to clean large amounts of glass
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to clean the large amount of glass on my sliding glass doors and picture windows. When used as instructed, it does such a better job than paper towels or microfiber wipes. You do need a wipe or rag handy to catch drips that occasionally occur as you're cleaning and to wipe the dirt off of the blade.
customer_reviews.author: NJ resident

customer_reviews.title: Perfect squeegee!
customer_reviews.text: We have used a number of squeegees and find this product to be the best one yet! I like that it's wider than normal, so it makes the job go quickly. I wish the handle was just slightly longer, but overall this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Eagleson

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Low quality. My dad and I used to do window washing for a living and this tiny blade does NOT cut it! Bottom line, pay a little more for a PROFESIONAL blade!
customer_reviews.author: John 3:16

customer_reviews.title: No screw on handle
customer_reviews.text: There is no screw on handle. So this useless unless you also buy their brand of extension pole.
customer_reviews.author: Camp Guy

customer_reviews.title: Never had cleaner windows!
customer_reviews.text: I now have the cleanest patio windows in my apartment building. Excellent product comes with extra replaceable rubber component.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Heavy duty. Using it in my shower. It's been a few months of daily use. We have salt water softener and I don't see any rusting so far. The rubber glides nicely and leaves a streak free surface!! It's wide enough that it only takes me a few swipes to wipe down 2 walls of glass.
customer_reviews.author: cali-girl

customer_reviews.title: Niiice
customer_reviews.text: Squeegee works great on windows. I actually use it to dry the sides of my 5th wheel camper. Just wish you could screw a broom handle into the end of it. It only accepts a special attachment
customer_reviews.author: This guy

customer_reviews.title: Does a splendid job.
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works. I have a small one I bought in Germany at a profi shop in Germany, this one is just as good.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Great squeegee!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this yet, but I have used this type in the past and they are the go to squeegees if you want clean professional windows. Easy and sturdy to use. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: We use on the glass shower walls and door. It works amazingly well. It is the best one we have purchased over the years.
customer_reviews.author: LLov

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Size for our large shower it's practical. Not ergonomic, no hanging hook. Single not double blade. Prefer to shorter but higher quality oxo. This one come with an extra blade which will save button new one when rubber seats out.
customer_reviews.author: pacificNW

customer_reviews.title: Good performance
customer_reviews.text: this is certainly one of the best that i have ever used, it leaves nothing to be desired in its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana Costa

customer_reviews.title: BEST  squeegee ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best squeegee ever! Glides over the wet windows and leaving no streaks! Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl David

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky Clean
customer_reviews.text: Effective squeegee. We keep it in the shower to keep the glass wiped off to prevent water spots. Also great for cleaning windows, storm door, and patio doors. It makes short work off puppy dog nose prints!
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Cheap ! Really bummed mine was taken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this .. it’s not taught and it’s rather well .. it doesn’t do a very good job .. the rubber isn’t stiff and secure
customer_reviews.author: Wednesday O’Byrne

customer_reviews.title: wipes water off of glass successfully
customer_reviews.text: It's a squeegee. It wipes water off of glass successfully. Not real pretty for keeping in the shower, but size trumps beauty with a lot of glass and marble tile to squeege after every shower.
customer_reviews.author: drewnis

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The squeegee pictured in the advertisement and on the back of the packaging is NOT the same as I received. The squeegee does not screw onto the extension pole. it is a tapered friction fit. I will be contacting Unger about this false description. Very disappointed when I went to use it on my extension pole.
customer_reviews.author: Jack O

customer_reviews.title: Needs screw adapter
customer_reviews.text: Needs a simple plastic screw adapter. Pro's use a tapered end on their poles. Home owners don't.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: The rubber was not as thick as I thought, but it did the job.
customer_reviews.author: McCoy

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I lived 35 years without this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I clean new construction homes and tried this for the first time today. It was life changing!!! I will also be purchasing the smaller 12" for smaller windows. Worth every penny and more!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Nice works very well I hadn’t realized how much my old one was worn on the edge until I used this one nice large size gets a good portion clean at one time
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Goodall

customer_reviews.title: Pro quality.
customer_reviews.text: Pro quality second to none. Easy to attach a long rod to reach higher.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wu

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe that I've been using paper towels to clean windows all these years. Everyone needs to know about squeegee
customer_reviews.author: Broker71

customer_reviews.title: best  squeegee ever!
customer_reviews.text: this does a better job than anything i have every used - I hope these are in production forever, because i am now a life customer!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I’d like that it is heavy duty and comes with an extra blade
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: good unit
customer_reviews.text: Extra blade (rolled up) is a nice bonus. Well made
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning sliding glass doors. They e never been cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Wide easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Unger is a brand you can trust. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Keep it in shower. Works much better than the cheap little plastic ones from Walmart
customer_reviews.author: HoosierPa

customer_reviews.title: Flexible
customer_reviews.text: Works just like I needed it to. We live on the coast and the sea mist leaves the windows salty and cloudy requiring frequent cleaning. This squeegee was perfect and does a great job...few streaks and windows sparkle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes window cleaning easy.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice device makes window cleaning easy and not have to use a bunch of paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: Marc T.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It would be great if it was able to be screwed onto any extension pole
customer_reviews.author: george bennett

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far.
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. Substantial weight to the squeegee, and smooth rubber to get all the water drops off my shower doors.
customer_reviews.author: RumbleSis162

customer_reviews.title: Quality control and missing part ...
customer_reviews.text: Received with one of the threaded bolts and nut missing that attaches the squeegee to the handle. Poor quality control for something visible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love This Thing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2nd story windows along with a brush, telescopic pole, and bucket and they all work great together.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for windows. Works very well. Now have a 12" & 18" - window washing is now pretty easy!!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Klassen

customer_reviews.title: other reviews were right on!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a bit of experience with squeegees in showers. I have to agree with the others...this one is excellent!!!! I will absolutely be buying another when this wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Michaele

customer_reviews.title: squeegee
customer_reviews.text: a little heavy but works and the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Handle is not threaded. You can't screw it on an extension pole.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F.

customer_reviews.title: Not a threaded handle.  Mis-leading description
customer_reviews.text: I guess I will use duck tape to attach to my telescopic pole. Please change your mis-leading description to say it only attaches to a pole that you sell
customer_reviews.author: Donald K.

customer_reviews.title: Quality squeegee at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well. Beats cleaning windows with cleaners and paper towels!
customer_reviews.author: DmanDan

customer_reviews.title: Squeegee great, missing bonus rubber
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Unger products before because of their quality and ease of use. Ordered this squeegee because of the bonus rubber. Received squeegee, no bonus rubber. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sepiol

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: People wonder how i get the windows so clean, i show them the squeegee. good quilty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice and sturdy to replace on a floor cleaner for the plant
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Kate (Angela Naff)

customer_reviews.title: It was a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like how the product feels, a little heavier of a squeegee but it actually works nicely! And the extra rubber was an awesome bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Squeegee I have ever used and it comes with a bonus replacement rubber making this a sweet deal.
customer_reviews.author: Neal B.

customer_reviews.title: Quickly Dries Large Shower Enclosure Panels
customer_reviews.text: The squeegee that came with my shower enclosure was WAY too small and it took forever to dry the panels. This one is nice and big and gets the job done in just a few swipes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: good squeegee once you reinstall the rubber
customer_reviews.text: works well once you reinstall the rubber(was not properly installed before being shipped) which is somewhat of a pain. This is why I could only give it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: New York

customer_reviews.title: Keep Moving, nothing to see here.
customer_reviews.text: Product not delivered as shown. Did not include the rubber grip. Basically poor design and usability.
customer_reviews.author: War Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Handle not Treaded
customer_reviews.text: This is an average squeeze but the two stars is because it does not have a threaded handle. If you want to reach higher places you have to buy an Unger telescoping pole. You can not use a standard threaded pole. You have to buy another pole just for this squeegee. Who wants another special pole just for a squeegee. Beside needing to buy angers pole the squeegee is nothing special for cleaning window.
customer_reviews.author: D Noel the first

customer_reviews.title: This squeegee is SOOO much better than the ones you can buy in the grocery ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional, but use these for glass showers and windows at home. This squeegee is SOOO much better than the ones you can buy in the grocery (or similar) store. You get a rubber edge vs. plastic - much better
customer_reviews.author: tfro

customer_reviews.title: Window cleaning made EASY
customer_reviews.text: Quick & easy window cleaning, that's why the pros uses these! Need to also buy the scrubber to apply the window cleaner solution to complete the program. Big plus is even the cheap glass cleaners work great with this setup. This is the sure way to eliminate streaks and speed the process up...
customer_reviews.author: Alan T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent squeegee!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent squeegee! A little heavier than what I used in the past, but I believe it did a better job. The blade did great getting all the moisture and carried it off at the end of the pull on the squeegee. The edges were clean and dry too. I would definitely buy this tool again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Buy it & enjoy cleaning windows
customer_reviews.text: Works so much better than a smaller one I had. Wipes my large windows clean in two sweeps. The wiper is a large thick piece of rubber?? Not sure if that's what it is but it sure outperforms the thin one. Couldn't b more satisfied, makes light work out of cleaning my windows which makes it pleasurable....did I just say I enjoyed cleaning my windows.....buy it ull like it
customer_reviews.author: Solo Serenity

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I never clean large windows becauseusing a spray and paper towels doesn't work. I tried the unger system and the windows were easy to clean with no streaking. Project went faster than I expected and I had no prior experience. Recommend squeegee and separate mop head rather than both in the same tool.
customer_reviews.author: Kodiak reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Squeegee
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality squeegee, easy to hold, well made. The only down side is that it does not attach to any extension pole. Apparently, this one uses only a particular pole. I have another squeegee that I use if I need to put on an extension pole. This one is great for those windows you can reach easily.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I've used a better version of this product, but for the price, this product gets the job done. It could be a little sturdier for my taste since we used it on a pole, but it worked with a little extra effort.
customer_reviews.author: HonestlySpeakingDez

customer_reviews.title: Finally a squeegie with replacement blades available
customer_reviews.text: Squeezgies do not fail. ..blades do. Our box store do not sell replacement blades, just replacement squeegies. Pleased to find a quality squeegie with replacement blades at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Just works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly, rubber blade is soft and removes moisture efficient. The handle offer good grip and is comfortable, as well as the tool being light weight and thin enough to get those tight corners. The extra rubber blade is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: maui

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Looks like this will work great and it is nice to have the extra rubber squeegee. It is a great size. Just need to find the right handle.
customer_reviews.author: Deholm

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: If you want a large blade (16"-18") squeegee with a short handle to quickly clean your shower doors, then by all means get this one this size. Works like a charm, and does the job so much faster than the standard shorter blades that you see in the box department stores.
customer_reviews.author: aljora

customer_reviews.title: Unger Professional Steel Squeegee with Bonus Rubber, 16"
customer_reviews.text: The commercial Squeegee With the extra 16 inch rubber is great to have. I know it will handy to have
customer_reviews.author: James R. Spillane Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This is a superior squeegee.
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and removes water better than the prior squeegee I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Kent and Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to squeegee the water off our outdoor kitchen granite. Works great
customer_reviews.author: GoProUser

customer_reviews.title: Not that good!
customer_reviews.text: The unit doesn't do a good job. It leaves water droplets on the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish that I had purchased this sooner...
customer_reviews.text: As described, well made, and easy to use. The additional rubber edging is a great and appreciated bonus.
customer_reviews.author: DucksTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: tough, good design.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product. Works as expected, very tough and sturdy. So much easy to clean out windows with this fellow. Totally recommend it for hard to reach places once you attach it to a nice rod.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Solid and easy to replace the rubber.
customer_reviews.text: A very solid squeegee. Lightweight and very easy to use. Great feel in your hands. The rubber is durable and doesn't slide out.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: Great product highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, much more sturdy then the ones you buy at your local Home center. Work streak free and bonus of extra replacement rubber
customer_reviews.author: Gds

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Good suction use for my slider two swipes done !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We use this to keep the shower clean. Does the trick. We wanted something just a little longer than the typical squeegee, and this works well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great for house windows
customer_reviews.text: This is to replace previous one I've had for years. Same good quality and easy to use. I like spare rubber but just need to remember where I put it.
customer_reviews.author: bobbylee1013

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great squeegee for the money. I also purchased the extension pole. Very happy with my clean windows.
customer_reviews.author: TLMPort

customer_reviews.title: Shower squeegee
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a shower squeegee. The width is great. It makes that chore go quickly and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: good tool
customer_reviews.text: Good squeegee and came with a 2nd rubber blade. I'm hapy.
customer_reviews.author: Keith L

customer_reviews.title: SUPER!
customer_reviews.text: Great window tool! My sis cleans construction homes and offices and she recommended this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing squeegee, better price. You will thank yourself.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing squeegee. It may sound strange, but this squeegee grips the glass like a high end tire and removes all traces of water and debris. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: It really makes the job of cleaning the windows easy.
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I have large picture windows on the back of my house.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to wipe down the shower walls and glass. Sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Professional in its performance
customer_reviews.text: I like the size for the area it covers. It cleans the water away without smearing.
customer_reviews.author: walter  j zawislak

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It leaves a very clean path when cleaning the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Nice product to make cleaning windows easy .
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and excellent for window washing .. Happy with purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Dollar

product_meta.title: Unger Professional Steel Squeegee with Replacement Rubber, 16"
product_meta.description: Size:16 Inch (Pack of 1)This rust-resistant, 16-inch, stainless steel squeegee from Unger features an ergonomic rubber grip that is lightweight and designed for comfort. The professional grade rubber blade cleans windows with streak-free results. A replacement rubber blade is included with the squeegee. Attach to Unger's Professional Dual End Aluminum Pole (sold separately) to reach high windows. Unger guarantees to replace any Unger Professional branded product found defective in material, construction, or workmanship.
feature_bullets: Professional-grade rubber blade cleans windows with 100% streak-free results
Squeegee attaches to nearly any telescopic pole for extended reach, without the need for a ladder
Constructed of durable, rust resistant stainless steel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars587 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
